text:
I put both a servlet and some custom tags in a package that is deployed in
WEB-INF/classes. The servlet runs fine. When I load a JSP containing custom tag
I get the compile error: package xxx not found.

If I deploy the application on a 4.0.3 server everything works fine.
creator: kdekooter@gmail.com

text:
This looks like a duplicate of bug 12387 (workarounds given in the other report
if this is the case).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12387 ***
creator: remm@apache.org
